author: Didi
install_msg: Thanks for installing the APOD cog! Use `[p]apodset` to configure the channel and posting time.
name: APOD
short: NASA Astronomy Picture of the Day
description: Fetches and posts NASA's Astronomy Picture of the Day. Supports daily auto-posting, configurable channel, time, and info toggle.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores channel IDs, post times, and configuration settings for each server. It does not store personal user data.
